data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the Malagasy Camponotus grandidieri and niveosetosus species groups (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) using qualitative and quantitative morphology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rakotonirina, Jean Claude, Csősz, Sándor, Fisher, Brian L. (2017): Taxonomic revision of the Malagasy Camponotus grandidieri and niveosetosus species groups (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) using qualitative and quantitative morphology. Zootaxa 4238 (2): 203-245, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.2.2
